name: AccountContactRole
description: Represents the role that a Contact plays on an Account.
summary: The {AccountContactRole} object in the {salesforce} application is used to track the relationship between an account and a contact. It has attributes including Id (unique identifier), IsDeleted (boolean indicating if the record is deleted), CreatedDate (timestamp of when the record was created), CreatedById (reference to the user who created the record), LastModifiedDate (timestamp of when the record was last modified), LastModifiedById (reference to the user who last modified the record), SystemModstamp (timestamp of when the record was last modified), AccountId (reference to the account), ContactId (reference to the contact), Role (picklist field for the role of the contact in relation to the account), and IsPrimary (boolean indicating if the contact is the primary contact for the account).
label: Account Contact Role
